about_the_game:
Lone Knight is a cute and stylized adventure-exploration game set in a vast interconnected world full of mystical creatures, robots and magic. Explore the devastated land of Taneda, fight fierce adversary, befriend quirky creatures looking to survive, and seek the corrupted signal that leads you to this dying world.

GAMEPLAY
- Explore a mysterious world full of weird creatures
- Unlock map that help you discover uncharted paths
- Dodge, dash, slash a full set of enemies as you progress through the land of Taneda
- Unlock new abilities through the "powered vest" allowing you to reach previously inaccessible areas

FEATURES
- Classic side-scrolling action
- Dodge, dash, and slash enemies and elements that are on your way.
- Meet a wide cast of characters during your journey.
- Customize your player abilities through the "powered vest" you are finding on your way.
- Explore a vast interconnected world. Full of hidden secrets, fierce enemies, untold stories. A true Metroidvania.
- Map your progress through the mapping system as you explore the land of Taneda.
- Sharp and precise character movement with tight melee combat.
- Highly-stylized pixel art - each frame animated by hand. True retro aesthetic with modern controls.

short_description: Lone Knight is a 2D Metroidvania, inspired by games like Super Metroid, Hollow Knight, Zelda: A link to the past and Haiku the robots. You'll explore a vast interconnected land, trying to survive looking for the source of a corrupted signal that holds the key of your future.
